channel.title: Gospod on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Gospod on Rusland 1

item.title: Gospod – Holy Metal and the Seven Deadly Sins
item.description: Greed The Main Sins of Humanity (2021) contains seven tracks, which shouldn’t come as a surprise. Greed is the first, and it makes you want more. The lyrics were not found online, but here they are, with спасибо (thanks) to Gospod.
